Solar Brilliance

Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Solar Brilliance
Requires sun presence:1
The sun starts to shine with a brilliance that destroys the retinas of all soldiers on the battlefield and burns all undead and demonic units to cinders.
All units: 5% chance of being blinded (easy MR negates). All undead units: 5 AP dmg (easy MR negates)
